EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 1_Top 5 Reasons flyer-Financial
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia simplifies private cloud and OpenStack
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Get the facts about a cloud migration for your enterprise Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
All the techno-babble about private cloud and key technologies, such as OpenStack, can be confusing. Before you decide on a cloud solution, get clear, straightforward facts about how a private cloud can actually help your financial services enterprise.
Read our one-page fact sheet “Top 5 Reasons for Financial Services Private-Hybrid Cloud with Nokia. <[[http://resources.nokia.com/asset/200353?did=d000000000a4&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1b-top5flyerfinancial&utm_term=finance]]>” It provides the straight facts about a complex topic and offers five compelling reasons why you should consider migrating to an OpenStack private cloud with us.
I hope that you enjoy the fact sheet! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2018 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
